title: Miley Cyrus Declares She’s Single With an 'Extra' Grand Canyon Photo Shoot
text:
From ELLE

Miley Cyrus loves a nature photo shoot, especially after a breakup. The singer shared her first personal photos after news broke this weekend that she ended her month-long romance with Kaitlynn Carter. Cyrus and her husband Liam Hemsworth announced their separation just as her and Carter's public romance began last month.

Cyrus posed in the Grand Canyon, and the vibe was I'm on a journey of self-discovery, and I'm going to look very hot during it. There was a chic hair flip shot. "Extra. ⛰," she captioned it, with respectable self-awareness.

And then there was the casual abs pic. "Consistency 🧡," Cyrus captioned that Instagram. Her sister Brandi Cyrus knew what she was doing and playfully called her out for it in the comments: "Uh is this the gun show orrrr???" she wrote.



Cyrus posted a similar outdoors shot in her first Instagram after her and Hemsworth's separation was announced in August. Cyrus was in Italy on vacation then (with Carter, but she appears alone in her photos), and she was transparent about where she was emotionally in her caption. Cyrus wrote, "Don’t fight evolution, because you will never win. Like the mountain I am standing on top of , which was once under water, connected with Africa, change is inevitable. The Dolomites were not created over night, it was over millions of years that this magnificent beauty was formed. My dad always told me 'Nature never hurries but it is always on time'.... it fills my heart with peace and hope KNOWING that is true. I was taught to respect the planet and its process and I am committed to doing the same with my own ...."

Cyrus ended her romantic friendship with Carter, by the way, because it was becoming too much, too fast. “Miley doesn’t want a serious relationship,” a source told People. “She and Kaitlynn spent every day together, and it just wasn’t anything that Miley wanted to continue doing. She wants to focus on her career.”
